title: Frontiers: New Discoveries About Man and His Planet, Outer Space and the Universe
description: Frontiersprobes the furthest boundaries of prehistory, science, earth space and the universe. It is a collection of short, topical and intriguing essays through which Isaac Asimov, the incomparable writer of science fiction, proposes brand new answers to classic scientific conundrums.
author: Isaac Asimov
